script.line: Hi there! Welcome to the World's Most Colourful Ball of Yarn and Ball Museum! I'm Croco and-- Oh hey, Prota.
Hey Croco! Wow, so the Ball Museum has a new name, huh?
Yep! Management's really going all in on the new attraction. It's the star of the show!
"The World's Most Colourful Ball of Yarn" is gonna be the talk of the town.
How colourful is it? Can you give me a little sneak peek before the Festi-Ball?
Oh no! Heck, I haven't even seen it myself. But I'm pretty excited for the unveiling.
Plus they gave us these great shirts!
I was wondering about that. "Boy Boy?"
"Ball Of Yarn" Boy.
Huh. I like it.
Thanks! But I'm sure you didn't just come here to compliment my t-shirt... Can I help you with something?
I hope so! I'm looking for Minty.
That's your dog, right?
Yep! I was supposed to be spending the day with Professor Marbels in his lab...
He planned to unveil his new invention tonight. But there was a bit of an... incident. And Minty ran away.
And you still haven't found her?
Not yet. But I have it on good authority that this is a good place to look! And it makes sense.
Definitely. You know what they say: Balls are a dog's best friend!
I don't know if people really say that.
Oh, I know. I was quoting our lowest-selling shirt: "You know what they say: Balls are a dog's best friend!"
They can't all be winners.
So I guess you haven't seen Minty then, huh?
Fraid not, bud. I've just been working on--hmmm.
HMMMM.
Hm?
Well, I was just about to say I've been working on the window display for the Festi-Ball!
A showcase of the best and brightest balls in our museum! Something to draw folks in.
I wasn't sure which balls to use, but maybe if we pick some of Minty's faves, she'll be enticed?
Huh. Not a bad idea, Croco! I like it. Let's set the perfect Minty trap.
Great! Management says I should use one SPORTS ball, one FOOD ball and one NATURE ball.
Let's start with sports! Which ball do you think Minty would like best?
Hmmm...
